title: "PUMA Reveal The 22/23 Serie A Match Ball"
excerpt: "Kicking off a new era, PUMA have today unveiled the 22/23 Serie A official match ball, their first since taking over from Nike. The PUMA ORBITA Serie A, as it is known, features powerful graphics inspired by the Lega Serie A logo and blends elements of Italian progressive art."
